alert.note: Alert for Portage; Waupaca; Waushara (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 6:46PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Portage, northwestern Waushara and southwestern Waupaca Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 645 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Plainfield, or 14 miles east of Wisconsin Rapids, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Plainfield around 655 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hartman Creek State Park and Napowan Scout Camp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and northeastern Wisconsin.
